original_text: As for God, his way is perfect: the word of the Lord is tried: he is a buckler to all those that trust in him.
korean_text: 하나님의 도는 완전하고 여호와의 말씀은 순수하니 그는 자기에게 피하는 모든 자의 방패시로다

sentences.original_text: As for God, his way is perfect:
the word of the Lord is tried:
he is a buckler to all those that trust in him.
sentences.korean_translation: 그에게 의지하는 모든 사람에게 방패가 되시니라.
